channel.title: [PI] Armor equips as a weapon..?
channel.description:
During my server development I've noticed that some items like armor go in the weapon slot. (ex.) Grain sack (meant to be cape) equips in weapon slot. If anyone could help me out, that would be great. Also, I know it has something to do with the item.java, but would I just add the items in there? I'm fairly confused...
Thanks, Darien

item.title: [PI] Armor equips as a weapon..?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

Try this then:

public static boolean playerCape(int itemId) { String[] data = { "cloak", "cape", "Cape", "attractor", "Attractor", "Ava's", "sack", "Sack", "Grain", "grain" };

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Armor equips as a weapon..?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

In item.java find this:

public static boolean playerCape(int itemId) { String[] data = { "cloak", "cape", "Cape", "attractor", "Attractor", "Ava's" };
After "Ava's"
Add:, "sack"
So it shoud look like this:

public static boolean playerCape(int itemId) { String[] data = { "cloak", "cape", "Cape", "attractor", "Attractor", "Ava's", "sack" }; Post any errors.

Read full topic

soooo confused
